body:
Alright so let me explain. I only have 30 dollars and I need a new keyboard and mouse. I was thinking of getting the cm storm devastator because it's a very value oriented bundle. But I staggerd along an old version death adder by razer :O for thirty dollars! So which one should I buy? I need a new keyboard because it's complete shit, but I would REALLY like a new awesome mouse. Which should I get? 
This:http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823129030&cm_re=cm_storm_devastator-_-23-129-0...

Or this:http://www.ebay.com/itm/Razer-DeathAdder-3500-DPI-Gaming-Mouse-Infared-Wired-Right-Hand-Free-Shippin...
 What i have right now: http://www.amazon.com/Wired-Soft-Touch-Keyboard-Black/dp/B00D3TIMU0/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=140272354... 
http://www.amazon.com/Gear-Head-Wireless-Optical-Mouse/dp/B0041A3LJ2/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=14027235...
